Title: 189: How I Got 45,000 Linkedin Followers in One Year
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Data Science Mentor, Randy Lao. You will learn how Randy Lao made a big rise in LinkedIn starting out with 45,000 followers and several Data Science jobs in just one year. You will also hear about the whole process of getting a job in Data Science from preparing your portfolio to getting data science jobs & opportunities, and learn that one thing that Randy is very passionate about which is the "end goal of Data Science".


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/189
